dynaForm.ADD_TABLE: SELECT * FROM ADDITIONAL_TABLES Create from a PM Table
dynaForm.COPY_PROCESS_UID:
SELECT PRO.PRO_UID, CON.CON_VALUE FROM PROCESS AS PRO, CONTENT AS CON WHERE PRO.PRO_UID = CON.CON_ID AND CON.CON_CATEGORY = 'PRO_TITLE' AND CON.CON_LANG = '@#LANG' ORDER BY CON.CON_VALUE ASC
Process - Select a process -

COPY_TYPE.en: Showing forms of type Normal Grid

dynaForm.COPY_DYNAFORM_UID:
SELECT DYN.DYN_UID, CON.CON_VALUE FROM DYNAFORM AS DYN, CONTENT AS CON WHERE DYN.PRO_UID = '@#COPY_PROCESS_UID' AND DYN.DYN_TYPE = '@#COPY_TYPE' AND DYN.DYN_UID = CON.CON_ID AND CON.CON_CATEGORY = 'DYN_TITLE' AND CON.CON_LANG = '@#LANG' ORDER BY CON.CON_VALUE ASC
Dynaform to copy/import - Select a dynaform -
dynaForm.COPY_DYNAFORM_DESCRIPTION:
SELECT CON.CON_VALUE FROM CONTENT AS CON WHERE CON.CON_ID = '@#COPY_DYNAFORM_UID' AND CON.CON_CATEGORY = 'DYN_DESCRIPTION' AND CON.CON_LANG = '@#LANG'
Description of the new dynaform
